Author: brandnewlow
Content:
Sure. Pageviews/1000 x cost per thousand impressions = Payout.

Sure there's cost per click ads, affiliate links etc, but display ads are still a big force out there and as long as that's true, then Digg's powerful.

Huffington Post does monster numbers. They're also on the front page of Digg all the time for rewriting other people's reporting. Digg drives a lot of traffic their way, but how many of those people stick around and engage?

Author: zmimon
Content:
> If you think that Africans have a genetic or cultural disposition towards corruption, then that is your opinion, and I'm not going to try to change it. I disagree completely

What else do you call it when a large proportion of a society broadly engage in and accept a practice?

I think it's fine if you don't like calling it a "cultural disposition", but you have to call it something. For some reason this practice is entrenched there (or do you disagree with even that?) and it's a major obstacle to progress in eliminating poverty. If we can't even refer to it using some terms to describe it, how can we deal with it?

Author: adminprxn
Title: PHP Programmer/Developer for Web-based Application (Medical) (Castro Valley, CA)
Content:
About our company: We are an aggressive start-up (profitable since inception) going on 3 years located in Castro Valley, CA. We have a stealth stage web-based application to help people like yourself get medications from your doctor's office instead of having a prescription filled at a Pharmacy. We have a working prototype currently in use by multiple clients. It's time to bring the programming and development in-house with brilliant, creative, and driven individuals.

Subject: (PHP Developer) Programmer/Developer for Web-based Application of Medical Company in Castro Valley, CA.

You would be expected to help plan, research, develop logic, code, document, test, and deploy several Web projects with conceptual assistance. You should know how to build a professional and technically streamline website, as well as modify and build on existing code.

Applicant must have:

Minimum 3 years of heavy hands-on experience in web-based software development projects.

Extensive knowledge of PHP 5, ASP, VB, SQL, DLL, HTML, JavaScript, IIS, MySQL queries, schemas, and best practices. MS Access, ODBC relational database management.

Experience with AJAX and JQuery.

Good communications skills and fluency in English.

Strong understanding of system development life cycle and solid experience of building GUI based on the client's requirements.

Ability to function effectively with a team and independently; demonstrated creative skills a definite plus. Require multi-tasking.

Applicant must be U.S. citizen or a legal permanent resident (green card), please no H1 visa holders.

Strongly Recommended:

In depth knowledge and experience with at least one of the following: PHP, CSS Zend Studio (Eclipse) experience

Working knowledge of PHPUnit and Phing (or Ant)

MySQL 5 (stored procedures, views, triggers)

Extra Credit:

Flash

Flex

A clinical/medical informatics background well versed in the work flow of medical clinics.

Professional Qualifications:

Successful candidate should have 2-3 years hands on experience for the position

A minimum of BS in Computer Science or equivalent

Excellent communication and presentation skills

Excellent interpersonal and teamwork skills

Compensation and Benefits:

A great culture with continuous learning and opportunities for career advancement

Compensation: Commensurate with experience

Paid holidays and vacation after 90 days

Medical Insurance/Dental/Vision after 90 days

This is not a web or telecommute position.

Location: On-site work required (Office across from Castro Valley BART Station).

East Bay San Francisco, Castro Valley, CA

Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.

Please, no phone calls about this job.

Please do not contact job poster about other services, products or commercial interests.

Location: Castro Valley, CA it's NOT ok to contact this poster with services or other commercial interests Compensation: Submit Requirements: Commensurate with experience Please submit c.v. or resume along with compensation requirements to admin@physiciansrxnetwork.com

Author: scott_s
Content:
Because it is the premiere environment for manipulating images. But I think he used pictures because that allows us to have an intuition for the kinds of analysis that he's doing, not because he's setting Mathematica up as competition to Photoshop.

As someone else pointed out, these sort of techniques could be useful for the kinds of matrix manipulations and image analysis that scientists and engineers do. Personally, I'm impressed that Mathematica appears to handle images the same as matrices. That's powerful, and of interest to hackers.

Author: netcan
Content:
Can you provide evidence in support of that claim?

A test for culture/genetics might be found in immigrants. Particularly those that do not immigrate to big expat communities. Even those might be interesting to look at. I think you'll find that people bend quite a distance to what their environment is. I dare say American expats participate in corrupt practices.

My own take on this is that corruption can hit a point where it is the system of government. It's not that dirty cops are cops that started taking bribes & then got used to it. They take the job in the first place in order to accept bribes. If you take away corruption, you take away the police.

Same goes for many other elements.

Author: phex
Content:
My experience is that extensive procedure comes because the small company start up approach doesn't scale to large companies. Every one I have worked at that has transitioned from from 10s to 1000s of people was failing because it tried to continue as if it was 10 wizards at it. The wizardy actually hindered others because it was opaque to them.

Interestingly the biggest company I worked for actually ran the best because perhaps its roots being 80+ years before any of the others would allow the significant difference to be tracked.
